title: DPS Hour 2
itunes:title: DPS Hour 2
description:
Ryan Clark talks to Dan about the NFL draft. Ryan says that NIL is out of control because of the NCAA and lack of past involvement and oversight.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
